settings.title: Important Notice:  Please expect delays in order processing and deliveries due to nationwide community quarantine conditions. Thank you for your understanding.

settings.page_title_description: The perfect place to find the polo that's made for you.

Reissued or inspired from the archives, this season the polo is playing the authenticity card. A relaxed cut and unbuttoned open collar for women. A two-tone ribbon and Lacoste badge on the sleeve give a vintage look for men.

settings.layer_slide_description: Straight cut, wide sleeves, two buttons, iconic green crocodile and the original Petit Piqué stitch. Slip into this polo for style and comfort.
Fitted cut, tailored sleeves and waist, multiple crocodiles and fabrics. This polo highlights your figure.
Fitted cut, shirt collar, concealed buttons, tonal crocodile and stretch piqué stitching. This polo embodies subtle French elegance.
Straight cut, two buttons, short sleeves, and the iconic green crocodile. This Petit Piqué polo enhances all body shapes.
Fitted waist, elongated buttoning, narrow sleeves and a tonal crocodile. This polo in stretch mini piqué frames the figure with subtlety.
Fitted waist, three-quarter sleeves, mother-of-pearl buttons and a tonal crocodile. This polo in stretch mini piqué frames the figure with elegance.

settings.layer_description: Discover all of the Lacoste fits and find the one that suits you best.

settings.layer_tile_description: Bright white, elegant black, formal grey...Neutral tones that match with everything.
Bold red, iconic green, electric blue...Colours that pop and turn heads.
Flamingo pink, teal blue, olive green...Soft and alluring shades.

settings.layer_description: Over 100 inimitable colours developed by Lacoste. Discover the polo in every hue.

settings.layer_tile_description: A signature fabric by Lacoste made with multiple threads for a textured feel that ensures comfort, flexibility and style.
Two-button placket, mother-of-pearl buttons, ribbed collar, gathered cuffs and side slits...It's all in the signature tailored finishes.
herever it lands, 1200 embroidery stitches are required to make the crocodile appear.

settings.layer_description: Signature fabric, tailored details and the iconic crocodile.

settings.layer_title: In the footsteps of the crocodile
settings.layer_description: Everything you didn't know about Lacoste

settings.bb_desc: Born in 1996, the Storm 96 is back to the streets in its original version. With its 90’s inspiration line, the new retro-running is dedicated to the bold and creative youth. Strong silhouette and vibrant colors, it’s the perfect sneaker for those who push the boundaries of creation but want to remain elegant. Learn from the past, create your own future.

Born in 1996, the Storm 96 is back to the streets in its original version. With its 90’s inspiration line, the new retro-running is dedicated to the bold and creative youth. Strong silhouette and vibrant colors, it’s the perfect sneaker for those who push the boundaries of creation but want to remain elegant. Learn from the past, create your own future.

settings.title: L.12.12 Polo Merci, solidarity with a heart
settings.text: To support the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies, all sales (excl. taxes) of the polo will enable the implementation of health protection programs for volunteers in 23 countries where there is currently no medical coverage.

settings.title: A polo for a big THANK YOU
#CrocoSeries: 3 artists, 3 visions, 3 styles
settings.subtext: The crocodile is reinvented with the inspired strokes of FriendsWithYou, Jeremyville, and Jean-Michel Tixier.

settings.title: Storm 96 Lo: You Set The Pace

settings.page_title_description: Uniting elegance and movement, Lacoste aims to give confidence to modern women in their everyday lives.

settings.title:
Iconic Woman
Katrina Razon
settings.description:
Empowered leader and inspiring entrepreneur Katrina Razon creates meaningful impact as an investor, producer, and DJ.

One of her many projects is the Wonderfruit Festival, a music festival celebrating diversity in a way that is carbon neutral and beneficial for the environment.

Katrina's effortless elegance and steadfast spirit are an inspiration to Filipinas everywhere.

settings.tc_label: By clicking on 'Sign Up', you agree to the terms of the Privacy Policy.

settings.heading: Lacoste X National Geographic
settings.text: The exclusive Lacoste and National Geographic collaboration celebrates the beauty of the natural world with prints inspired by the striking colors and patterns of four incredible species.

settings.title: Jaguar elegance
settings.subtitle: NATURAL ALLURE
settings.text: With its alluring contrast of dark spots on bright beige, the jaguar's iconic coat sets it apart from all other felines. Seen on a polo or eye-catching accessories, this delicate-yet-powerful print ensures your style gets noticed. Distinguish yourself naturally in the urban jungle with Lacoste's signature silhouettes.

settings.title: The crocodile and the jaguar
settings.text: Elegance and endurance for a standout style.

settings.title: Grévy's zebra individuality
settings.subtitle: BETWEEN THE LINES
settings.text: With its graphic coat that exists nowhere else in nature, the Grévy's zebra is recognised immediately— just like the Lacoste crocodile. Even as they blend into a herd of hundreds, these slender zebras stand out in the savannah. Seen on a Lacoste backpack or embellishing the Gagnant sneaker, this print highlights your personality with a subtle touch.

settings.title: The crocodile and the zebra
settings.text: Leave a trace in black and white

settings.title: Poison dart frog agility
settings.subtitle: THE ART OF CAMOUFLAGE
settings.text: Shifting from an electric blue with black spots to repel predators, to a subdued colour to blend into its environment, the poison dart frog knows how to adapt to any situation. Agile of body and mind, just like Lacoste, it inspires reversible pieces like this double-sided coat that shifts to match your style in no time.

settings.title: The crocodile and the frog
settings.text: A quick-change wardrobe. Get ready for the big leap.

settings.title: Dragonfly freedom
settings.subtitle: IN FLIGHT
settings.text: With its transparent wings and iridescent glow, the dragonfly moves about with total freedom—a pillar in the Lacoste mission since the first polo was created in 1933. With inherent grace, the dragonfly has a majestic effect that, when seen up close, reveals a detailed motif that has been reproduced on this reversible puffer jacket.

settings.title: Founder: Joel Sartore
settings.subtitle: The National Geographic Photo Ark
settings.text: The National Geographic Photo Ark uses the power of photography to inspire people to help save endangered species before it’s too late. Founder and photographer Joel Sartore has taken portraits of over 10,500 species — and counting — in his quest to document the approximately 15,000 species living in the world’s zoos and wildlife sanctuaries.

settings.title: The complete Lacoste wardrobe for her
The complete Lacoste wardrobe for him
Lacoste x National Geographic: Nature's Grandeur
settings.text: The Jaguar's elegance, the Poison Dart Frog's agility, the Dragonfly's freedom, and the Grévy's Zebra's individuality—Lacoste and National Geographic blend the crocodile vision with four amazing animals in a collection made from recycled and eco-friendly materials.

settings.title:
Lacoste x Ricky Regal
Exclusive Collaboration

settings.title: L.12.21: The new classic Men's polo
settings.subtitle: L.12.12, 2021 STYLE
